welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Chong Nonsi, a vibrant city known for its bustling street markets, rich cultural heritage, and delicious food. Immerse yourself in our city's charm and enjoy all that it has to offer. We hope you have a wonderful stay!"

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: This is the main terminal at Suvarnabhumi International Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: This terminal is primarily used for international flights, with some domestic flights also operating here.

wifi.note: Passengers can enjoy free Wi-Fi throughout the airport, with no time limit.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal for domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A newer terminal primarily used for low-cost carriers.

wifi.note: WiFi is available throughout the airport, but may have limited coverage in certain areas.
